name: Give Up Ninja Blockman 3
description:
After the defeat of The Hacker in the last adventure, The Hacker has moved to Business City and have 10 of his most powerful ninjas go after Ninja Blockman. 

Ninja Blockman has met 2 new strangers named Jimmy (who is The Hacker's younger brother) and Achilles (who is a god-like being).  

Can Ninja Blockman take down The Hacker? (With his new headband too?)
